text: Motoi Oyama (尾山 基, born February 2, 1951) is a Japanese businessman specializing in footwear. After graduating from Department of Commerce of Osaka City University, in January 1982 he joined ASICS where he worked ever since. In July 2001 he became President of ASICS Europe, and between June 2004 and February 2008 held senior manager positions at the central ASICS offices. On February 8, 2008, he was appointed as ASICS President, and in April 2011 also became its Chief Executive Officer.Motoi Oyama.
